com.google.api.client.apache
Class ApacheHttpTransport

java.lang.Object
  com.google.api.client.http.LowLevelHttpTransport
      com.google.api.client.apache.ApacheHttpTransport

public final class ApacheHttpTransport
extends LowLevelHttpTransport

HTTP low-level transport based on the Apache HTTP Client library.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Yaniv Inbar

Field Detail

INSTANCE

public static final ApacheHttpTransport INSTANCE
Singleton instance of this transport.

Sample usage: 

 HttpTransport.setLowLevelHttpTransport(ApacheHttpTransport.INSTANCE);

Method Detail

supportsHead

public boolean supportsHead()
Description copied from class: LowLevelHttpTransport
Returns whether this HTTP transport implementation supports the HEAD request method.

Default implementation returns false.

Overrides:
supportsHead in class LowLevelHttpTransport

supportsPatch

public boolean supportsPatch()
Description copied from class: LowLevelHttpTransport
Returns whether this HTTP transport implementation supports the PATCH request method.

Default implementation returns false.

buildHeadRequest

public com.google.api.client.apache.ApacheHttpRequest buildHeadRequest(String url)
Description copied from class: LowLevelHttpTransport
Builds a HEAD request. Won't be called if LowLevelHttpTransport.supportsHead() returns false.

Default implementation throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

Overrides:
